Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations

Class Build

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.GameOperation<BState,​ApplicableBRules>
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.Build
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExpandableGameOperation
public class Build
extends GameOperation<BState,​ApplicableBRules>
Brief Build GameOperation dedicated to the building phase of the game. It provides the rules needed by the game operation in order to perform its task. Besides this also performs the block type selection and the building action. It uses BRules and BState to obtain and execute the needed rules
See Also:
GameOperation, BRules, BState
